headline: Nvidia Will Give U.S. a Cut of Its AI Chip Sales to China. The Stock Gets a Bump.
summary: Nvidia  stcok inched up Monday after the Trump administration confirmed that a portion of its AI chip sales to China will go to the U.S. government.  Nvidia rival AMD stock was up 1.63% after it climbed 0.2% on Friday.  Nvidia will pay 15% of the revenue they generated from AI chip sales to the government, President Donald Trump confirmed on Monday.

headline: Palantir or AMD: UBS Picks the Superior AI Stock to Buy After Earnings

headline: Nvidia, AMD Stocks Fall. Trump Wants U.S. to Get Cut of China AI Chip Sales: Report.
summary: Nvidia  stock was dropping early Monday following a report that it will give the Trump administration a portion of the sales from its artificial-intelligence chips to China.  Nvidia shares were down 1.4% at $180.23 in premarket trading.  Nvidia and its smaller rival  Advanced Micro Devices  have both agreed to remit 15% of the revenue they generated from AI chip sales in China to the Trump administration, The Wall Street Journal reported Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline: 2 High-Flying Stocks to Own for Decades and 1 We Turn Down
summary: Expensive stocks often command premium valuations because the market thinks their business models are exceptional. However, the downside is that high expectations are already baked into their prices, leaving little room for error if they stumble even slightly.

raw.headline: 2 High-Flying Stocks to Own for Decades and 1 We Turn Down
